identity.philosophy: Soft Utility - Approachable but structured. Data density without visual clutter.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Grid precision with Soft UI warmth.
Content is King: Data legibility is the primary goal.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group data, not lines.
Contrast: High contrast for text, subtle contrast for containers.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest.
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body.

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Active States, Brand Highlights

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense, compact. Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms.

marketing.name: Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetry, visual tension. Mix hero, square, tall, and filler shapes.

layout.container_rules: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

cards.classes: bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-indigo-500/20 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 rounded-lg shadow-sm

navigation.sidebar: bg-slate-900 text-slate-300 w-64 h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 border-r border-slate-800

visual_enhancers.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero sections only.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for modals/dropdowns.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use Framer Motion for page transitions and list entrance animations (staggerChildren).

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Do not center-align everything. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Do not use AI emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸš€, etc).

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Recruitment Management System. Use the 'Control Room' grid for dashboards. Use the 'Tetris' grid for the candidate profile page. Implement the 'Electric Indigo' theme. Use the provided image URLs for avatars and logos. Ensure all forms use Shadcn components with the specified overrides.
